Tip of the Day
Being overencumbered only slows down your activities, but doesn't affect travel.

Metal scrap
Type: Material
Value: 0
Fine Value: 6
Keyword: Offcut
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Some low-quality metal offcuts.

The Metal scrap item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Metal scrap is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Create a copper bar (Scrap) Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 1 5x Metal scrap 1x Copper bar
Create a bronze bar (Scrap) Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 10 10x Metal scrap 1x Bronze bar
Create an iron bar (Scrap) Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 20 20x Metal scrap 1x Iron bar
Create a steel bar (Scrap) Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 30 40x Metal scrap 1x Steel bar
Create a tarsilium bar (Scrap) Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 40 80x Metal scrap 1x Tarsilium bar

Sources
